\{Q , b_{r}\} & =& A \{c^{m}, b_{r}\} (\Phi_{m} + \frac{1}{2} S_{m}) + \frac{1}{2}A c^{m}[S_{m} ,b_{r}] \\ \nonumber

\begin{eqnarray}
\delta_{\varepsilon} F  &=& {\hat q}\varepsilon  F = -\varepsilon
{\hat q} F (C^{a} , c^{a}) =

\delta_{\varepsilon} c^{a} \frac{\partial}{\partial c^{a}})F  \\ \nonumber
& &= (-\varepsilon C^m {f_{mn}}^a B_a c^n -\frac{1}{2}\varepsilon {f_{mn}}^{a}c^{m}c^{n} b_{a})  
\
